intro: Argyrolobium wilmsii, commonly known as the Wilmsii silver globular veldtgrass, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Fabaceae family, which is characterized by its leguminous properties and nitrogen-fixing ability. The plant produces small, rounded, silver-gray seed pods that contain several seeds. It typically grows in open, sunny environments and is adapted to arid or semi-arid conditions. Its unique appearance and ecological role make it an important species in its native habitat.
